message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more as I'm starting the game.
Let's try a bit more in my favor this time
Let's be reasonable, Bob. I'll take a bit less than my initial offer, but going any lower is just a waste of time with this inflation.
Inflation is biting, let's settle this quickly
Bob, we're running out of time! This is my final offer - take it or leave it. It's better than losing everything to inflation.
